Test Case Details: Validate all UI elements are visible on products page
Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to /web/products
2. Verify page heading
3. Verify search input
4. Verify category filter
5. Verify price inputs
6. Verify Apply/Clear buttons
Expected Results: All filter elements should be visible

Test Case Details: Validate products are displayed on page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Count visible product cards
3. Verify at least one product is shown
Expected Results: Should display multiple products

Test Case Details: Validate product card contains all required information
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Select first product card
3. Check for name; category; price; stock; buttons
Expected Results: Product card should have name; category; price; stock; View Details; Add to Cart; Like buttons

Test Case Details: Validate price displays with 2 decimal places
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Check all product prices
3. Verify format is $XX.XX
Expected Results: All prices should display in format $XX.XX with 2 decimals

Test Case Details: Test View Details button redirects to product detail page
Expected Results: Should navigate to specific product detail page

Test Case Details: Test Add to Cart increases cart badge count
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Note current cart count
3. Click Add to Cart on a product
4. Verify cart count increases
Expected Results: Cart badge should increment; alert should show 'Added to cart!'

Test Case Details: Test Add to Cart shows success alert
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click Add to Cart on a product
3. Wait for alert to appear
Expected Results: Should show 'Added to cart!' alert message

Test Case Details: Test Like button toggles between liked and unliked states
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click Like button on a product
3. Verify button state changes
Expected Results: Like button should toggle between â¤ï¸ Liked and ðŸ¤ Like

Test Case Details: Test search functionality with valid product name
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter 'Laptop' in search
3. Click Apply Filters
4. Verify results contain search term
Expected Results: Should display products matching 'Laptop'

Test Case Details: Test search with term that returns no results
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter non-existent product name
3. Click Apply Filters
4. Check for no results message
Expected Results: Should show 'No products found' or empty list

Test Case Details: Test category filter functionality
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Select Electronics from dropdown
3. Click Apply Filters
4. Verify products are Electronics
Expected Results: All displayed products should be in Electronics category

Test Case Details: Test All Categories shows all products
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Select All Categories
3. Click Apply Filters
4. Verify multiple products shown
Expected Results: Should display products from all categories

Test Case Details: Test price filtering with valid min and max
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter min price 50
3. Enter max price 500
4. Click Apply Filters
Expected Results: Should display products within $50-$500 range

Test Case Details: Test price filter with min > max
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter min price 500
3. Enter max price 50
4. Click Apply Filters
Expected Results: May show no products or validation error

Test Case Details: Test price filter with negative values
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter negative min price
3. Enter positive max price
4. Click Apply Filters
Expected Results: Application should handle negative values appropriately

Test Case Details: Test Clear button resets all filters
Test Data: search: Laptop, category: Electronics, min: 50, max: 500
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Apply multiple filters
3. Click Clear button
4. Verify all filters reset
Expected Results: Search; category; and price inputs should be cleared; full product list shown

Test Case Details: Validate pagination buttons are displayed
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Scroll to pagination section
3. Count pagination buttons
Expected Results: Should display multiple page number buttons

Test Case Details: Test clicking pagination button changes page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click on page 2 button
3. Verify products load
Expected Results: Should load different set of products

Test Case Details: Test active page button is highlighted
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click on page 2
3. Verify button 2 has active class
Expected Results: Clicked pagination button should have active styling

Test Case Details: Test last pagination page displays products
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Click on last page number
3. Verify products are displayed
Expected Results: Last page should display remaining products

Test Case Details: Test applying search; category; and price filters together
Test Data: search: Laptop, category: Electronics, min: 100, max: 1000
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Enter search term 'Laptop'
3. Select Electronics category
4. Set price range 100-1000
5. Click Apply Filters
Expected Results: Should display laptops in Electronics category within price range

Test Case Details: Test adding multiple products to cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Note cart count
3. Add first product to cart
4. Add second product to cart
5. Verify cart count
Expected Results: Cart badge should reflect total unique products added

Test Case Details: Validate stock information is shown for each product
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Check first product
3. Verify Stock: X format
Expected Results: Each product should display stock in 'Stock: X' format

Test Case Details: Test category filter with no products
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/products
2. Select category with no products
3. Click Apply Filters
4. Check for message
Expected Results: Should show 'No products found.' message
